title: I Cant Enter The Game Tutorial
body: First When I Installed the game and logged in, I Didn't see the Word ''Start Now'' in order to start the game tutorial. I see only ''Patching'' No More and I havent played The Game tutorial yet. Can u help me plz? :'(  Here is the Problem : http://prntscr.com/knx1qx

replies.body: Hey there, it looks like your client is still trying to update.  Make sure to hop on a wired connection if you haven't already, and update your[ firewall settings](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) so your network is clear of any blocks while reaching patching services.

Hey Porocles!, Is it possible your could take a look at my ticket? 
- I have been waiting for five days, with no answer yet.. :/
